text: Rayman Origins is a platform video game developed by Ubisoft for PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, Wii, Nintendo 3DS, PlayStation Vita and Microsoft Windows, is considered the continuation of Rayman 3: Hoodlum Havoc, the sequel Rayman Legends was launched on 2013. == Development == The game was originally planned to be downloaded in format of chapters and released on ends of 2010, but the game was delayed by undefined time, on April of 2011 the project was declared by Ubisoft as "Not Dead" In May on an interview with Michel Ancel was announced that the game will be released at ends of 2011, finally the game was released on physical format. == Other websites == * Category:2011 video games Category:Rayman Category:Cooperative video games Category:MacOS games Category:Multiplayer and single-player video games Category:Nintendo 3DS eShop games Category:Nintendo 3DS games Category:Platform games Category:PlayStation 3 games Category:PlayStation Vita games Category:Side-scrolling video games Category:Video games about dreams Category:Video games about shapeshifting Category:Wii games Category:Windows games Category:Xbox 360 games
title: Rayman Origins
